definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: another (prop. one coming behind), f. [[אַחֶ֫רֶת]] (with dag. f. implic.); pl. [[אֲחֵרִים]] (as if from sg. [[אָחֵר]]), once Job 31:10 [[אֲחֵרִין]], [[אֲחֵרוֹת]] (= Ar. 0’a0xaru, Sab. [[אאחַר]], As. aḫru future fpl. as subst. aḫrat ûmê future of days) Ge 4:25 [[זֶרַע אַחֵר]] another seed Ge 8:10 [[שִׁבְעַת יׇמִים אֲחֵרִים]] seven other days Ex 22:4 [[בִּשְׂדֵה אַחֵר]] in the field of another + oft.; [[אִישׁ אַחֵר]] another man (husband) Ge 29:19, De 24:2, Je 3:1; [[חָחֵר הָאַחֶרֶת]] 1Ki 7:8 the other court, v. [[חָחֵר]]; ´[[הַחוֹמָה א]] 2Ch 32:5 the other wall, v. [[חוֹמָה]]. Appended to a n. pr. for distinction Ezr 2:31= Ne 7:34 (see v:Ezr 2:7 = Ne v:Ne 7:12) Ne 7:33 (prob. here txt. err., v. Be Ry:18: not in Ezr 2:29). Often with the collat. sense of different, as ´[[בְּגׇדִים א]] other garments Le 6:4, 1Sa 28:8, Ez Eze 42:14, Eze 44:19; [[עָפָר]], [[אֲבָנִים]] Le 14:42; [[רוּחַ]] Nu 14:24; ´[[וְנֶהְפַּכְתָָּ לְאִישׁ אַ]] 1Sa 10:6; [[לֵב]] v:1Sa 10:9, Ez Eze 11:19 (LXX Hi Sm); [[שֵׁם]] Is 65:15 (cf. Is 62:2 [[חָדָשׁ]]); with that of strange, alien, as ´[[אִישׁ אַ]] De 20:5, De 20:6, De 20:7, De 28:30 ( so [[אַחֵר]], [[אֲחֵרִם]] alone Ps 109:8, Job 31:8, Job 31:10, Is 65:22, Je 6:12, Je 8:10 al.); [[עַם]] De 28:32; [[אֶרֶץ]] De 29:27 Je 22:26; [[אִשָּׁה]] Ju Jdg 11:2; [[לָשׁוֹן]] Is 28:11 (‖[[בְּלַעֲגֵי שָׂפָה]]); esp. in the phrase [[אֱלהִים אֲחֵרִים]] other gods (63 t.) Ex 20:3 (= De 5:7) Ex 23:13 (both JE) Jos 24:2, Jos 24:16 (E) 1Sa 26:19, Ho 3:1, & particularly in Dt (De 6:14, De 8:19 + 15 t.) & Deut. writers, as Jos 23:16 Ju Jdg 2:12, Jdg 2:17, Jdg 2:19 Je (18 t.) & compiler of Kings; [[אֵל אַחֵר]] once Ex 34:14 (JE). So [[אַחֵר]] alone Is 42:8, Ps 16:4. † Of time, following, next (rare) ´[[בַּשָּׁנׇה הָאַ]] Ge 17:21 (P) in the next  year; 2Ki 6:29 ´[[בַּיּוֹם הָאַ]]; ´[[דּוֹר אַ]] Joe 1:3, Ps 109:13 poet. the next generation (Ju Jdg 2:10 in prose = another generation).
